Text.Page:
I heard a disturbing report from the front lines. Something about a weird, red argon that's tougher than expected?

Speak with Drokhir at Khanovar Citadel. He's putting together a strike mission.

Yes, these red argons appeared after one of our operatives used a new argon device. We don't know much more than that. I've got a pile of scrolls from the Invalesco wanting more details.

Head into Carnage Vale, find this device and see what happens next.

This plating looks different. Stronger, too.

I'll get a courier to transport these components to the Invalesco.

Helping the Invalesco's just smart strategy. They want to stop the argons, too.

Find those red argons, . Kill 'em dead.

This plating looks different. Stronger, too.

I'll get a courier to transport these components to the Invalesco.
